I am making this review after having a lot of good, bad matches, and very strange matches... this game is a 4v1 horror styled survival game. You play against a killer or against survivors to either finish 5 genorators (as the survivor) or sacrifice every survivor (as the killer). This game has a lot of good unique things to love about it and also things that are strange, need a buff, or are the current meta and is a bugger to deal with. Both survivor and killer have 4 aquirable perks that can be equipped as of leveling up that specific character through playing matches and earning currency by how well you do in the match (this system is great, it tells you if you help out, objective based, boldness, and survival (as the survivor, different stats for killer, of course)) the 4 perks that you equip on yourself can be used in the game to help you out and make it harder for the opposing team to do their job. Perks are specific to charcters that you have and can be spread to different survivors/killers by leveling up the charcter enough to get "teachable perks". Every character has 3 unique perks. ISN'T THAT CRAZY, there is a LOT of perks in this game. More than 150 perks across the game. The problem in my opinion is that a lot of these perks can be really strong and seen a lot in sweaty matches or perks you will never see cause they are bad or just better things to use rather than it. Behavior works really hard in this game to make it as enjoyable as possible which will be very hard, because of the sheer amount of things in this game that can be improved. I would love to see more of there perk patches, because they always try to improve on the game by sending these perk patches. Anyway, fun game, but current meta is boon totems and dead hard let's be real. Also change the Nightmares add-ons, they suck. Thanks for reading, sorry for the explaining the game part of this.

[h1]왜 이겜 추천 하냐고요? 파란색으로 떠야 님들 한테 잘 보이잖아요[/h1]

TL:DR: The Game is no longer fun, at least on a mid to high level. The toxicity is more present in this game than the fun

[list]
[*]From a survivor perspective, more and more killers are resorting to camping/tunneling/slugging because the developers rewards you and encourages you to implement this strategy. While this may be effective to achieve victory, it is no fun for the people that are forced to endure it. People seem to have long forgotten why we are here playing videogames: to have fun, not to sweat like our life depended on it.
[*]On the other hand you have the killer gameplay. So, you should be the one in control of the gameplay? Right? Nope, that's because the better you get, the worse your experience in Dead By Daylight is gonna become. Let me explain. Becoming better usually means winning more games, which implies your rank goes up, which results in you being matched with more experienced players. As your rank gets higher, you will notice an overall worsening of your experience. Essentially, playing anything that is non-meta is going to result in you getting absolutely demolished. Players' toxicity will drastically increase alongside with your rank.
[/list]
Also, there are major problems with the servers, and the hit registration. They told that they were trying to fix this problem, but it's been 5 years, and they couldn't fix that problem, which makes your experience not enjoyable at all. Instead, they prioritized trying to find more ways to shove DLCs into the game, so people would buy and forget the major issues like the game being unbalanced, laggy and so on.. 
Looking on the bright side, if you don't care about your rank at all, and just want to pass some time with friends, this is a great game to do it. But, being honest, it will start to be boring quickly, plus, all the issues mentioned earlier will affect in some way.

In conclusion, play something else, don't bother purchasing something that's supposed to be a videogame but ends up being a burden.

я терпила

总体来说，非常不错的一款游戏！
新手期会很难适应，但多看看攻略、多跟大佬交流、多玩玩就会慢慢找到越来越多的乐趣！人类从蘑菇精到卡视角机皇，再到第一次溜鬼等等……屠夫的话，心态一定要好！只要玩人类多一些以及跟朋友一起开黑，就知道他们干的那些讨人厌的事，你玩人类的时候这样干也会特别开心，只是一个游戏，娱乐就好了！毕竟，人屠间无法用语言交流，只能用肢体动作交流，以及互相推测心理与博弈，这样的互动是如此有魅力，不是吗？版区博弈、心理博弈、以及互相卖卖萌，都是很好玩的地方，毕竟彼此都是活生生的人类玩家呢~
游戏里面的版权屠夫的制作，比如麦叔、鬼面、三角头、追追、护士等都非常尊重原作，让影迷和游戏迷们可以使用自己喜欢的角色，这真的太棒了！！而且麦叔鬼面真的超还原的，无论是形象还是技能和游戏方式来说！
我爱鬼面呜呜呜呜呜呜呜！虽然他强度很低，但是真的很好玩，而且很可爱，希望早日加强！！！加个进柜出柜相关技能或者看破惩罚啥的嘿嘿~
当然，不愉快的体验也是有的，比如说人类匹配比较慢，尤其是晚上，一个小时两把、幼崽屠夫总是匹配到车队等等，还有猖獗的外挂，蜜汁bug、一大堆印度技能等等……但总体来说，我还是很喜欢的！
纯萌新，整天开局就能和屠夫面对面亲嘴碰到，一直被屠夫追的那种。朋友推荐的，游戏很好玩。单人玩的时候可能没啥意思，主要都是和朋友一起溜达着玩。（买了那么久，没怎么玩，属实抱歉）

Be advised you'll feel like the killer finds you first in every match for the first 100 hours, don't fret the game gets better as you learn characters skills and perks and you'll become a pro in no time. :D

Fantastic game. Love the collaborations they get for this game, keeps the game fresh and more enjoyable to play as iconic horror characters. After almost 500 hours I can say that the MMR system is a little rough but maybe that's just me getting really competitive. Highly recommend playing with friends, this game is great for getting people to work as a team.
Overall I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys the horror genre, or a competitive experience.
